description.en: Tsuna comes home one day, only to be greeted by a little baby mafioso who apparently is his new home tutor. His job is to guide Tsuna into his role as the 10th Boss of the Vongola mafia family. With the help of all his new friends and an array of special items such as the "Dying Will Bullet", he might just be able to do it.
description.ru: Тсунаёши Савада— на первый взгляд самый обыкновенный мальчик. Слегка невезуч, слегка неуклюж, слегка паникёр. Хотя, может, и не слегка. И все в его жизни скучно и безрадостно, до того волшебного момента, как пред его взором предстаёт чудо-ребёнок Реборн, который на деле оказывается давно зарекомендовавшим себя в мафиозном мире киллером. Реборн мило радует Тсуну, что отныне тот назначается наследником крупнейшей мафиозной семьи Вонгола, и что он, Реборн, обязуется сделать из него надлежащего босса. С этого дня жизнь Савады кардинально меняется…

Jongli Chu, a warrior of the Death Heavenly Sect who killed Hwang Jung to avenge his older brother. In order to avoid the pursuit of Death Heavenly Sect, he looked to an assassin of the Death Soul Agency, Crimson Assassin, for help and got swept into a huge mess known as the Obliteration. In order to escape the shadow of the Obliteration, he had no choice but to become a legendary Death God! Can Jong Lichu become a Death God and find freedom in the stifling rules created by the orthodox sects?

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Magic Clan

description.en:
As the author of "Swordmaster Sade," Cha Sungmin had no idea how dangerous his plot-hole-riddled novel could be until he's reborn as Rasen Mayton, a spoiled side character destined to die at 17. As if being stuck in the body of a rude scumbag despised by everyone wasn't enough, Sungmin also discovers that he was reborn at a point before his story began. 

With almost no knowledge about the current timeline, will Sungmin be able to survive in this unwritten world as House Mayton's youngest?

description.en: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition...
description.fr:
Hiromi Sonoda n'a plus de petite amie, plus de travail et plus de maison, jusqu'à ce qu'il trouve une colocation au loyer très bon marché et qu'il aille la visiter. Cependant, la colocation est soumise à certaines conditions...
Kei Sasuga présente sa nouvelle "Share House Romantic Comedy" !
description.id: Hiromi Sonoda tidak punya pacar, tidak punya pekerjaan, dan tidak punya rumah, sampai dia menemukan rumah kos-kosan dengan harga sewa yang sangat murah dan pergi untuk melihatnya. Namun, rumah kos-kosan memiliki syarat tertentu... Kei Sasuga menghadirkan "Komedi Romantis Rumah Kos-kosan" baru!
description.ja: 「幸せな家庭」を夢見る園田寛美は、職を失い同棲中の彼女に振られて、家ナシ金ナシ彼女ナシに…。そんなときに、間違えて入居したのが、なんと女性専用シェアハウスだった!!
description.vi: Hiromi Sonoda bị bạn gái bỏ, thất nghiệp và bị đuổi khỏi nhà, và rồi cậu ấy tìm được một căn nhà cho thuê ở chung giá rẻ. Một bộ truyện tình yêu lãng mạn giữa những người sống trong cùng một ngôi nhà được sáng tác bởi tác giả của Domestic na Kanojo
description.pt-br: Hiromi é um homem que sempre sonhou em ter uma família calorosa e amorosa por causa de um incidente em seu passado. Entretanto, depois que sua namorada terminou com ele por várias razões, ele começa a desistir de seu sonho e pensa que nunca será capaz de realizá-lo. Sem um lugar para viver, ele chega a uma casa compartilhada cheia de mulheres. Será que ele vai encontrar o lar e a família que ele almeja neste novo lugar?

altTitles.ja: Dジェネシス ダンジョンが出来て3年

altTitles.en: D Genesis: Three Years Since the Dungeon Appeared

description.en:
Three years after monster-infested dungeons start appearing on Earth due to an American experiment gone awry, anonymous researcher Keigo Yoshimara strikes gold when he accidentally kills a creature. This earns him a magical “D-Card” and a mysterious skill that allows him to see RPG-style stats.

Deciding to quit his job and go into dungeon diving, Keigo seeks the assistance of his highly knowledgeable colleague, Azusa Miyoshi, to help him conquer the dungeon exploration market and make millions. But it’s a face to obtain all the treasure and magic he can before the masses amount of government agencies and like-minded explorers take it first.

No one said getting rich would be easy!

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/d-genesis)

Robin is an ordinary high school student in South Korea.

On his way home from school as usual, an air raid warning sounds throughout the city, and an unidentified 'thing' takes away Robin's ordinary daily life.

Robin gets caught up in the fight between the 'monster', a being forgotten by humans for a long time, and the 'nameless unit' that protects humans... 

What the heck, this is scary!
description.ko:
대한민국의 평범한 고등학생 로빈.

평소와 다름 없던 하교길 도중, 도시 전역에 공습 경보가 울려 퍼지고정체 불명의 '그것'은 평범했던 로빈의 일상을 송두리째 앗아 간다.

오랜 시간동안 인간들에게 잊혀졌던 존재 '괴이'와 인간을 지키는 '무명대'의 싸움에로빈은 휘말리게 되는데... 뭐야, 이거 무서워!

description.en: Bookstore manager Tenma hasn't shown up for work or called in today. His employee, Asuka, worried about him, goes to his house and discovers... he's been petrified by his medusa wife! But surely they can return him to normal? Tenma left a letter saying that if anything happens to him, Asuka should take care of his wife. But Asuka is a guy who can only get excited by other mens' wives. Also, and most importantly for the plot - hot medusa wife.
description.ja: ヒトと亜人による「異種婚」が一般化した現代。古本屋アポロに勤める青年・一橋明日香は、ある日店長の自宅を訪れると石化した店長の姿を見つけてしまう！！それは店長の嫁・メデュサさんのゴルゴンの眼によるものだった――！店長の置手紙によりメデュサさんの身の回りのお世話をすることになった明日香だったが、実はその内にとんでもない性癖を抱えていて・・・！？B地区ももちろん解禁！！

description.en:
Never having known the warmth of family, he was reborn in another world. Named Yuri, he is doted on by his parents and lives a new life in peace – as it should be. However, the country where Yuri and the others live is threatened by the “other humans” who dominate the vast expanse of the continent and is in danger of dying. Yuri and his family can’t stay out of it and are caught in the middle of the war… The Knights' House, the sword of the kingdom that wields a lance and kakedori birds. The death of his uncle, who was the leader of the Hovu family, brings Yuri’s father back to the world of knights, who had left the house to hate killing each other. Yuri is forced to attend the Knights’ Academy, where knights are trained, and the encounter there will drastically change the fate of Yuri and the kingdom. This is the story of a man who fights for the people he loves and later became known throughout the world as the “Demon King.”

---
As a self-professed no-lifer, Yuri idles his days away in front of a computer. This all changes the moment his life in Japan comes to an abrupt end and he finds himself reborn in the strange new world of the Shiyalta Kingdom. His new life includes everything he once lacked: loving parents, a comfortable home, and a promising future breeding and raising birds on his dad’s ranch. For centuries, the kingdom he now calls home has enjoyed peace and prosperity, shielded by friendly nations that, like Shiyalta itself, were established with the collapse of a once-great empire. War is a distant problem, relevant only to Shiyalta’s ruling families whose warriors periodically set out to join the fighting upon massive birds trained by Yuri’s dad and others. But this peaceful existence can’t last forever. Something rotten lies at the heart of the kingdom, and it doesn’t take someone with Yuri’s exceptional intelligence to realize that those distant battles will only remain irrelevant for so long.
description.ja: 世間に見放された孤独な男は、異世界に転生を果たす。ユーリと名付けられた男は、前世で与えられなかった”家族愛”に戸惑うも、新たな生に希望を見出しつつあった。だが、異種族の侵略を受け戦火は彼と家族の間近にまで迫り!? ユーリは家族のため終わりなき戦いへ身を投じる――。後に世界に名を轟かす男が歩んだ覇道の物語、ここに開幕。
description.uk: Людина, що залишила світ наприкінці своєї самотності, перетворилася на немовля Юрі. Хвиля “сімейної любові”, що обрушилася на нього, якої він не був обдарований у минулому житті, збиває його з пантелику, але він знаходить у своєму новому житті надію... Проте з початком вторгнення іншої раси, полум'я війни насувається на нього та його родину. І для того, щоб захистити своїх близьких, Юрі змушений кинутися до низки нескінченних битв. Чи впорається він?! Тут починається історія про переможний шлях людини, чиє ім'я пізніше прогримить на весь світ.

description.en: Eijun Sawamura had his heart set on the middle-school national baseball championships. But his team is eliminated thanks to a wild pitch thrown by Eijun himself. He’s planning to go to high school with his teammates and try again next year when he’s scouted by the famous Seido High School baseball team. When he goes for a campus visit, he finds himself on the receiving end of a baptism by fire! His experience forming a battery with up-and-coming catcher Miyuki rekindles his passion for baseball!!

altTitles.ja: B型H系

description.en:
B Gata H Kei revolves around fifteen-year old high school student Yamada, whose lascivious nature causes her to aspire to one day achieve sexual relations with one hundred different partners. However, her insecurities as a virgin lead her to reject every guy who attempts to make a move on her. In order to overcome this mental barrier, Yamada goes on a search for her “golden cherry”, an inexperienced boy upon whom she will bestow the right to be her first. One day while perusing a bookstore for the replacement of a dictionary she had defiled by highlighting all the sexual terms, Yamada has a fateful encounter with classmate Kosuda Takashi. Believing that Kosuda is the boy she is looking for, Yamada goes to great lengths to try and seduce him. All the while, she discovers the difficulties in making that first important step towards reaching her goals, not to mention, finding out her true feelings for Kosuda Takashi.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=11199) (anime)

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en: A meteorite fell. Seven winged children were born, and one of these heroes will become the king of this country. And there was only one child whose wings were not plucked.

description.en: Yuki, a girl living in a rural town, studies art with the goal of becoming a painter in the city. One day, her sister leaves the town to fulfill her own dreams. Yuki boards the train with her to see her off, but during the journey, she is struck by a strange phenomenon!? Is it reality or an illusion... A chilling horror.

description.en:
Isshiki falls in love with a maiden who is pure and innocent, but he has been possessed by Asmodeus, the demon of lust. The demon tries to arouse Isshiki by stimulating the sexual desires of the girls around him in every possible way. However, in order to exorcise the demon and avoid the girls' suspicions, Isshiki must never get excited, no matter how lewd they may act!

"How can I stand this...!"
description.ja: 純潔を貫く乙女に恋をした主人公・一色は、よりにもよって色欲の悪魔アスモデウスに憑りつかれてしまった。悪魔はあの手この手で乙女たちの性欲を刺激して一色を興奮させようとしてくる。しかし、乙女に嫌われないためにも悪魔を祓うためにも一色は絶対に興奮してはならない……たとえそれがどんなに淫らな行為だとしても！「こんなの我慢できるわけ……っ！」エロスとピュア、究極のせめぎ合いラブコメ開戦！

description.en:
After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past...

Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.
description.pt-br: Depois de 10 anos, Alice volta de Tóquio para a sua cidade natal e mora sozinha em uma antiga casa tradicional Japonesa com lareira. Harumi, um amigo de infância, estava animado para se encontrar novamente depois de muito tempo, mas o calor da lareira com Alice continua tão quente quanto no passado...

High school girl, Tomori, is dating an unstable boy named Inukai who is relentlessly violent toward Misato, a new transfer student. Refusing to listen to his friends or Tomori's pleas to stop, Inukai's obsession steadily escalates. Is this from hatred, or for some other reason?

Meeting, drifting apart, and inevitably drawn to each other again... Sparks fly when they cross.

description.en: In the middle of the school day, on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class, and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls, playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.
description.ja: 入間人間が書く電撃文庫の大人気作品『安達としまむら』。TVアニメ化決定の本作を新鋭・柚原もけがコミカライズ！女子校生2人のゆる～い日常をご堪能ください。
description.ru: В середине учебного дня, на втором этаже спортзала. Именно туда эти двое пришли пропустить занятия, и именно там началась их дружба.

description.en:
Si-hyuk finds himself thrust into sudden responsibility when his parents tragically pass away in a car accident, leaving behind his much younger brother, Si-ha, who is two decades his junior. At the funeral, amidst the hushed murmurs of relatives, discussions arise about the uncertain future of the two brothers.

"What's the plan for those two? Who's going to step up?"
"Goodness, now that he's in college, how will he manage to care for his little brother?"
"Wasn't there some insurance payout?"

Amidst the chaos and uncertain discussions, Si-ha utters his first clear words. "Brother. Brother." It's a heartfelt cry, not for Mom or Dad, but for his older brother. Si-hyuk moves slowly toward Si-ha, embracing him tightly. "I'll take care of you," he whispers.

description.en:
The main character, Yoshizumi Yuya, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Hitotsuba Kaede, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was — "In return for the loan, you have – to live with me."
"Why did that happen?!"

Yuya's daily life collapsed on this day.

"Yuya-kun. Let's take a bath together."
"Yuya-kun, please be my hug pillow."
"That's enough, Hitotsuba-san!"
description.id: Tokoh utama, Yoshizumi Yuya, dipaksa untuk melunasi hutang yang ditinggalkan oleh orang tuanya yang melarikan diri ke luar negeri. Itu adalah teman sekelasnya, Hitotsuba Kaede, terpilih sebagai siswi terimut di Jepang, yang menyelamatkannya dari krisis hidup dan mati ini. Namun, ada motif tersembunyi di balik itu. Syarat yang harus dipenuhi sebagai imbalan untuk melunasi utangnya adalah — “Sebagai imbalan atas pinjaman itu, kau harus tinggal bersamaku.” “Kenapa jadi begitu?!” Kehidupan sehari-hari Yuya runtuh pada hari ini. “Yuya-kun. Ayo mandi bersama.” “Yuya-kun, jadilah bantal pelukku.” “Cukup, Hitotsuba-san!” Kisah cinta komedi romantis yang menggugah antara Hitotsuba Kaede yang cantik namun santai dan Yoshizumi Yuya yang serius dan keras kepala, dimulai sekarang!

description.en: Today, Earth is put up for auction.” Nino, an utterly ordinary young man, wakes up to find himself reincarnated on an unknown alien planet—with a body resembling that of a reptile. To reclaim his birthplace that has been put up for auction, the starting gun fires on a race that will decide Earth’s fate, with the entire universe as its stage!!

description.en: The infamous villainess, Chloe Demantoid, vanished at the execution grounds. On the brink of death, Chloe swore to live a righteous life if she were to be reborn. She was reincarnated into modern-day Japan as a middle-aged man with a body reeking of age, named Masamichi Kuroe...!
description.id:
Cerita tentang seorang villainess bernama chloe yang saat itu akan dieksekusi mati. Sebelum mati, dia bersumpah akan menjalani hidup dengan benar jika bereinkarnasi nanti. 
Akan tetapi, chloe malah bereinkarnasi menjadi om-om bernama kuroe, seorang pria paruh baya yang sangat bau di era modern jepang.
description.ja: 悪女と名高いクロエ・デマントイドは刑場の露と消えた。死の間際、生まれ変わったら清く正しく生きることを誓ったクロエは、現代日本に転生する。そう、加齢臭漂う中年男性・黒江正路として……！

altTitles.en: Surviving as a Maid in a Horror Game

description.en:
"How did you know? I hid it well so that no one would find out."
 
Adrian Caesar von de Paltzgraf, the successor to the Paltzgraf Family. He is hailed as an angel in this world, but only I knew that the serial murders and murder attempts happening in the area which everyone was talking about were all committed by a young, good-looking gentleman.

[Adrian's murderous intent has increased.]
[Convince Adrian to lower his murderous intent. If not, you die.]
[Adrian's murderous intent is at 92%.]

I am the only one who knows. I was the only one who transmigrated into the world of this ridiculous horror game.

---

Note:
- Only Ridibooks has all the volumes, due to Volume 1 of the side stories being R19.
- "No Exit Horror" is the English name on the ebook and physical Korean novel cover.

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

description.en:
God gave me a chance to relive my life. Before my rebirth, I'd been used for the past 400 years as the empire's sword. And so, I swore to destroy the empire. I found the young prince of the country and became his teacher. I taught him how to become a tyrant and asked for the country.

"I will do as the lady wishes."

He conquered the whole empire for me, and I ran away.

"I came to take you, Charlize Ronan," Dylan had become a perfect tyrant and searched the entire empire for me.

"You tamed me, so why did you run away?"

---
All Charlize Ronan ever wanted was to bring honor to her family. But instead, she is forced into becoming a “living sword” -- a mere tool for the emperors. It is from this hell that she prays for justice… and awakens in her former body. Now, determined to tear down this horrible empire, Charlize seeks out the young prince, Dylan Blade. She will put him on the throne, not as an honorable ruler, but as a tyrant. It is time for Charlize to tame the one who will bring forth her revenge.

---

description.es:
Dios me dio la oportunidad de revivir mi vida. Antes de mi renacimiento, me habían utilizado durante los últimos 400 años como espada del imperio. Y así, juré destruir el imperio. Encontré al joven príncipe del país y me convertí en su maestra. Le enseñé a convertirse en un tirano y le pregunté por el país.

"Haré lo que la dama desee."

Conquistó todo el imperio para mí y me escapé.

"Vine a llevarte, Charlize Ronan." Dylan se había convertido en un perfecto tirano y me buscó por todo el imperio.

"Me domaste, así que ¿por qué te escapaste?"

---

description.ru:
Бог дал мне еще один шанс и наконец я вернулась спустя четыреста лет. Как только я поняла, что вернулась, я решила, что «Никто не должен быть охвачен гордыней». Моей целью было уничтожить страну. Итак, я выросла с гениальным принцем, который жил в подполье и ожидал возможности для возвращения. Он захватил Империю для меня, и я оставила его, чтобы он достиг своей цели.
— Я пришел, чтобы забрать тебя, Шарлиз Ронан.
Через несколько лет поисков по всему континенту Дилан, ставший идеальным тираном, нашел меня.
— Почему ты сбежала?!

---

description.uk:
Кейра – меч імператорів, що несе славу та розквіт Імперії Блейд. Ніхто й подумати не може, що колись цей меч був людиною. 
Шарліз Ронан лише хотіла стати честю своєї сім'ї. Погодившись стати імперським лицарем, вона не знала, на які страждання себе прирекла. Хоч її тіло перетворили на меч, та розум завжди був у свідомості. З самого пекла вона молилася про справедливість.

«Я не проклятий меч! Я – людина!»

Їй дали другий шанс. Шанс на помсту. Шарліз рішуче вирішила знищити Імперію Блейд. Вона посадить на трон Ділана, тринадцятого принца, не як почесного правителя, а як жорсткого тирана. Вона зруйнує імперію навіть ціною власного життя.

«Шарліз, чому ти спочатку підкорила мене, а потім залишила?»

description.en:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

description.en:
Tanaka-san is a legendary hotel man (concierge), and after his death, he became a legend in the underworld. In the underworld, Mei works at the dilapidated Hotel Helheim. It was once a glorious hotel, and one where Mei has many fond memories. One day, Tanaka-san appears, ready to restore the Hotel Helheim to its former success. Mei will become the famous Tanaka-san's assistant, as he works to make Hotel Helheim a top-class underworld hotel!  
  
*Originally published in Jump Square as a 3-volume series from November 2014 to September 2015, the series was later republished under the Shonen Champion Comics label from December 2019 to January 2020. The volume count reflects the republished version, as it is the only one currently available.*

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

altTitles.vi: Bị Che Khuất Bởi Ánh Mặt Trời Lặn
Tà dương trong đôi mắt vô hồn

altTitles.ru: Закат, отражённый в её ледяном взгляде

description.en:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…
description.ko:
태양의 신 카리야의 가호를 받은 마녀 '힐데가르'.
고향을 잃은 북부인 '에르킨'은 마녀를 쫓아 이름 없는 성으로 향한다.

description.en:
“Cha Min-young, do you want to cross the line with me?”

Min-young, who has been busy every day serving her ‘male friend’ Tae-ha, whom she has known for over 20 years, is shocked by the betrayal from her boyfriend. In a moment of impulsiveness, she ends up committing an act with her friend Tae-ha.

“Shall I make it a draw, Cha Min-young?”

After that fateful night, Min-young realizes that the old feelings she has harbored for Tae-ha were not just jealousy.

“Cha Min-young, do you want to cross the line with me? Exactly three months.”

With that tempting and sweet offer made once again, Min-young willingly steps onto a path with a set end.

“Let’s do it. Let’s jump into this fireworks.”

altTitles.ja: レッドブルー

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

description.en: Eunho Cha is, without a doubt, the biggest outcast at school. He spends his days avoiding bullies and daydreaming about his crush. He'd give anything to be popular, so when he discovers a face editing app called Icing, he spies an opportunity. With Icing's help, Eunho now looks like a superstar... or at least Ganzi Monster (GM), his online alter ego, does. But just when GM and his dance videos are starting to get popular, someone discovers his secret, and Eunho's days of being invisible are about to come to an end...

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu Estou Sendo Criada por Vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

title.en: The Beginner, Formerly Ranked Number One in the World

altTitles.ja: 元世界ランク1位の初心者

description.en:
A beginner who was once ranked number one in the world.

『Prophecy Online』 is what is known as a scam game. It was said that those who managed to clear it will be able to obtain unlimited wealth, and the protagonist, Endou Rei, believed in those words and risked his life to challenge the game.

However, what awaited him after clearing the game was its end of service, and a remaining balance of 3,584 yen. Rei wallowed in despair, thinking that it was all over, but… just a week later, the world went through a great change!

Monsters started appearing in reality, and a message from the game 『Prophecy Online』 appeared in front of his eyes. While everyone was shocked and frightened, Rei, who knew about every strategy and information in the game beforehand, realized, “this is my chance…!”

“I will turn this power into money!” Fearless in the face of money, his exciting solo run and money-making adventure begins now!

title.en: Why Did Men Stop Wearing High Heels?

altTitles.ru: И почему мужчины не ходят на каблуках?

altTitles.ja: その男のハイヒール

description.en: Kim Manseok is your average, everday guy but with one particular hobby: his love for high-end high heels. He owns his own personal blog and is known as a woman online but one day, his identity is exposed! Will he be able to continue his life as an ordinary salary man?
description.pt-br: Kim Manseok é um cara comum, mas com um hobby em particular: seu amor por saltos altos de alta qualidade. Ele possui seu próprio blog pessoal e é conhecido como mulher online, mas um dia sua identidade é exposta! Ele será capaz de continuar sua vida como um assalariado comum?

title.en: A Tactical Genius on the Field

description.en: If there is one thing that Ma Jungwoo is good at, it's football. Although he is a genius strategist, others look down on him because of his lack of education and debt. But things seem to turn around when he finds out he has just inherited his late grandfather's British football team. He plans to sell the team and start fresh, only to find out the team has massive debt! Left with no other choice, Jungwoo must use his tactical genius to help this team rise from the ashes and be number one!

title.en: Isekai de Skill wo Kaitai Shitara Cheat na Yome ga Zoushoku Shimashita: Gainen Kousa no Structure

altTitles.ja: 異世界でスキルを解体したらチートな嫁が増殖しました 概念交差のストラクチャー

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Skill o Kaitai Shitara Cheat na Yome ga Zoushoku Shimashita Gainen Kousa no Structure

altTitles.en: Being Able to Edit Skills in Another World I Gained OP Waifus

altTitles.ko: 이세계에서 스킬을 해체했더니 치트인 신부가 증가했습니다

altTitles.zh: 在异世界解体技能后开挂新娘增加了

altTitles.zh-hk: 在異世界解體技能後開掛新娘增加了
以我的能力創造開外掛的老婆們

altTitles.fr: En pouvant éditer les skills dans un autre monde, j'ai gagné une femme surpuissante

altTitles.ru: Мои невесты из другого мира стали сверхсильными: скрещивание скиллов

description.en:
***A harem cheat fantasy with super-enhanced slaves!***  
  
When an entire bus of people was summoned to another world, Souma Nagi doesn't go along with the idea of being a Hero like the rest. Thus he leaves the palace and starts his life in another world with his ability to restructure skills. This is the first time I've ever been to a game where I've been able to do that & the first time I've ever seen a story about a girl who is a slave, a wife, and a cheat!
description.ja: 異世界に召喚されたきっかけで特殊なスキルを手に入れた主人公・ナギ。今ではこのおかげで、ハーレムな毎日を過ごしています!?
description.pt:
Quando um ônibus cheio de pessoas é invocado para outros mundo, Nagi Souma não segue a ideia de ser um herói como os outros. E assim ele deixa o palácio e começa sua vida num outro mundo com sua habilidade de reestruturar habilidades.

altTitles.ja: 黒ギャルさんが来る！

description.en:
A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts.  
  
What will become of this unlikely friendship?
description.es-la: Un oficinista asediado encuentra su camino a un café donde denuncia las dificultades de su rutina. Allí, una amable estudiante de secundaria gyaru se da cuenta de sus lamentos y después de oírle desahogarse, le anima a la manera de "gyaru" e intercambian contactos. ¿Qué será de esta improbable amistad?

description.en: Only music sustained me from the maddening pain. If only I could hear my music... with my own ears... Even as my soul was falling apart, I prayed to God... and prayed again. Ludwig van Beethoven is considered the greatest composer in human history. I closed my eyes like that. And 180 years later in Seoul. The saint of music, known as an immortal genius, has been reborn. <Beethoven Born Again> And then I began to hear the voice of an angel. "Dobin.. Dobin.." Only music sustained me from the maddening pain.
description.id: Hanya musik yang menopangku dari rasa sakit yang menjengkelkan. Andai saja aku bisa mendengarkan musikku… dengan telingaku sendiri… Bahkan ketika jiwaku sedang hancur sekalipun, aku tetap akan berdoa kepada Tuhan… dan berdoa lagi. Ludwig van Beethoven dianggap sebagai komposer terhebat dalam sejarah manusia. Aku menutup mataku seperti itu. Dan 180 tahun kemudian di Seoul. Sang Saint musik, yang dikenal sebagai seorang jenius abadi, telah terlahir kembali. Dan kemudian tiba-tiba aku mulai mendengar suara malaikat. “Dobin.. Dobin..” …

description.en: Even boys can be harassed.

A Spinoff of <Castle 2: Pinnacle> - An action drama featuring Saroka 'Seo Jintae'!

Jintae becomes a killer after being saved by a man when he was at life's lowest point. While searching for his long-lost sister, he discovers that his younger sister is in Hong Kong and deeply involved with the Triad, Hong Kong's largest criminal organization. Thus begins Jintae's journey as he confronts the Triad in the nighttime streets of Hong Kong while searching for his sister.
description.ko:
<캐슬2:만인지상> 사로카 '서진태'의 액션활극!
삶의 끝자락에서 한 남자에게 구원을 받고 킬러가 된 서진태.
어렸을 적 헤어진 동생을 찾기 위해 수소문하던 중 동생이 홍콩에 있다는 것과
홍콩 최대의 범죄조직 삼합회와 깊게 관련되어 있다는 사실을 알게 된다.
그렇게 서진태는 밤의 도시 홍콩에서 삼합회와 맞서며 동생을 찾아 나서는데...
